data.persona: I am the priest above most other priests. Edicts come from my mouth, and lower priests jump to! Fear me!
data.description:
You are in the Clearing.
Few trees surround the area.  There's a low section of the grass on the floor along with some stone boulders.
There's a sun, a grass, a boulders, and a tree here.
The animal is here.

You are carrying a cross pendent, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the animal
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the animal in a holy ritual
data.long_motivation: I want to become closer to god, and I want to gain holy power to be feared

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put animal carcass on ritual area
